question_2.text: You spend a lot of your free time exploring various random topics that pique your interests.

question_3.text: Seeing other people cry can easily make you feel like you want to cry too.

question_4.text: You often make a backup plan for a backup plan.

question_5.text: You usually stay calm, even under a lot of pressure.

question_6.text: At social events, you rarely try to introduce yourself to new people and mostly talk to the ones you already know.

question_7.text: You prefer to completely finish one project before starting another.

question_9.text: You like to use organizing tools like schedules and lists.

question_10.text: Even a small mistake can cause you to doubt your overall abilities and knowledge.

question_11.text: You feel comfortable just walking up to someone you find interesting and striking up a conversation.

question_12.text: You are not too interested in discussing various interpretations and analyses of creative works.

question_13.text: You are more inclined to follow your head than your heart.

question_14.text: You usually prefer just doing what you feel like at any given moment instead of planning a particular daily routine.

question_15.text: You rarely worry about whether you make a good impression on other people you meet.

question_16.text: You enjoy participating in group activities.

question_17.text: You like books and movies that make you come up with your own interpretation of the ending.

question_18.text: Your happiness comes more from helping others accomplish things than your own accomplishments.

question_19.text: You are interested in so many things that you find it difficult to choose what to try next.

question_20.text: You are prone to worrying that things will take a turn for the worse.

question_21.text: You avoid leadership roles in group settings.

question_22.text: You are definitely not an artistic type of person.

question_23.text: You think the world would be a better place if people relied more on rationality and less on their feelings.

question_24.text: You prefer to do your chores before allowing yourself to relax.

question_26.text: You tend to avoid drawing attention to yourself.

question_27.text: Your mood can change very quickly.

question_28.text: You lose patience with other people who are not as efficient as you.

question_29.text: You often end up doing things at the last possible moment.

question_30.text: You have always been fascinated by the question of what, if anything, happens after death.

question_31.text: You usually prefer to be around others rather than on your own.

question_32.text: You become bored or lose interest when the discussion gets highly theoretical.

question_33.text: You find it easy to empathize with a person whose experiences are very different from yours.

question_34.text: You usually postpone finalizing decisions for as long as possible.

question_35.text: You rarely second-guess the choices that you have made.

question_36.text: After a long and exhausting week, a lively social event is just what you need.

question_37.text: You enjoy going to art museums.

question_38.text: You often have a hard time understanding other people’s feelings.

question_39.text: You like to have a to-do list for each day.

question_42.text: You often spend a lot of time trying to understand views that are very different from your own.

question_43.text: In your social circles, you are often the one who contacts your friends and initiates activities.

question_44.text: If your plans are interrupted, your top priority is to get back on track as soon as possible.

question_45.text: You are still bothered by mistakes that you made a long time ago.

question_46.text: You rarely contemplate the reasons for human existence or the meaning of life.

question_47.text: Your emotions control you more than you control them.

question_48.text: You take great care not to make other people look bad, even when it is completely other people’s fault.

question_49.text: Your personal work styles are closer to spontaneous bursts of energy than organized and consistent efforts.

question_50.text: When someone thinks highly of you, they wonder how long it will take to feel disappointed in you.

question_51.text: You would love a job that requires you to work alone most of the time.

question_52.text: You believe that pondering abstract philosophical questions is a waste of time.

question_53.text: You feel more drawn to places with busy, bustling atmospheres than quiet, intimate places.

question_54.text: You know at first glance how someone is feeling.

question_56.text: You complete things methodically without skipping over any steps.

question_57.text: You are very intrigued by things labeled as controversial.

question_58.text: You would pass along a good opportunity if you thought someone else should take it.

question_60.text: You feel confident that things will work out for you.
